title: [Sapphryn's Magic Shoppe]
[Sapphryn's General Store]
description: Pale oak walls rise from a varnished oak floor.  Just above a polar bear rug hangs a colorful Icemule map, and an oak beam ceiling completes the picture.  A large brass-bound chest and a dovetailed oak table stand side by side in the middle of the room.

Enclosed by pale oak walls, the shop features a polar bear rug in the center of its oak floor.  A colorful Icemule map hangs under the oak beam ceiling.  Right near the front is a large brass-bound chest and a dovetailed oak table.
